name: eDrawings 2D Drawing
summary: An EDRW file is a 2D CAD drawing created by Dassault Syst√®mes eDrawings Publisher, a plugin available for various CAD applications. It stores a design, including its components, assemblies, casings, and construction materials, in the eDrawings (EDRW) format, a lightweight, view-only format. eDrawings users typically share EDRW files with other eDrawings users to review mechanical design drawings, such as gear assemblies or engine components.
